Package RateLimiter

Class Api

java.lang.Object
RateLimiter.Api
public final class Api
extends java.lang.Object
This is the class where the tracking of requests is implemented.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    private java.lang.String apiID
    A string, which identifies an Api.
    private long currentFrameStart
    A time stamp which indicates the start of the current frame.
    private long currentRequests
    Number of requests served to the user in current time frame.
    private long frameLength
    The limit is generally specified in requests/second , so this value will be 1 second by default.
    private long limit
    Maximum number of requests allowed.
    private long previousRequests
    Number of requests served to the user in the previous time frame.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    Api​(java.lang.String apiID, long limit)
    Used for initializing the Api Id and it's limit.
    Api​(java.lang.String apiID, long limit, long frameLength)
    When the limit is not in requests per second, we use this constructor.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void decrementLimit()
    Will decrement the limit by 100 ,to utmost 1 request.
    void decrementLimit​(long dec)
    Will decrease the limit by a specified value , to utmost 0 requests.
    java.lang.String getApiID()
    Returns the Api Id.
    long getCurrentRequests()
    Returns the number of times the user has accessed this api within the current time frame.
    long getLimit()
    Returns the limit.
    void incrementLimit()
    Will increase the limit by 100.
    void incrementLimit​(long inc)
    Will increase the limit by a specific value.
    void requested​(Throttle throttle)
    Calculates if a user has exceeded his limit and takes appropriate action.
    void setFrameLength​(long frameLength)
    Used for setting the time frame length to a specific value.
    void setLimit​(long limit)
    Used for setting the limit explicitly.

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

  • Field Details

    • apiID

      private java.lang.String apiID
      A string, which identifies an Api.

    • frameLength

      private long frameLength
      The limit is generally specified in requests/second , so this value will be 1 second by default.

    • limit

      private long limit
      Maximum number of requests allowed.

    • previousRequests

      private long previousRequests
      Number of requests served to the user in the previous time frame.

    • currentRequests

      private long currentRequests
      Number of requests served to the user in current time frame.

    • currentFrameStart

      private long currentFrameStart
      A time stamp which indicates the start of the current frame.

  • Constructor Details

    • Api

      Api​(java.lang.String apiID, long limit)
      Used for initializing the Api Id and it's limit. Limit will be in requests per second.
      Parameters:
      apiID - A string, which identifies an Api.
      limit - Maximum number of requests allowed in a time frame.

    • Api

      Api​(java.lang.String apiID, long limit, long frameLength)
      When the limit is not in requests per second, we use this constructor. we can specify any arbitary units like requests per minute or requests per hour.
      Parameters:
      apiID - A string, which identifies an Api.
      limit - Maximum number of requests allowed in a time frame.
      frameLength - Length of the time frame in milli-seconds.

  • Method Details

    • requested

      public void requested​(Throttle throttle)
      Calculates if a user has exceeded his limit and takes appropriate action.
      Parameters:
      throttle - Used to inform the calling application if a user has exceeded the limit.

    • getLimit

      public long getLimit()
      Returns the limit.

    • getCurrentRequests

      public long getCurrentRequests()
      Returns the number of times the user has accessed this api within the current time frame.

    • incrementLimit

      public void incrementLimit()
      Will increase the limit by 100.

    • incrementLimit

      public void incrementLimit​(long inc)
      Will increase the limit by a specific value.

    • decrementLimit

      public void decrementLimit()
      Will decrement the limit by 100 ,to utmost 1 request.

    • decrementLimit

      public void decrementLimit​(long dec)
      Will decrease the limit by a specified value , to utmost 0 requests.

    • setLimit

      public void setLimit​(long limit)
      Used for setting the limit explicitly.

    • setFrameLength

      public void setFrameLength​(long frameLength)
      Used for setting the time frame length to a specific value.

    • getApiID

      public java.lang.String getApiID()
      Returns the Api Id.
